channel.title: Prey 2 Officially Canceled
channel.description:
[url]https://www.cnet.com/news/bethesda-confirms-prey-2-cancelled/[/url]
Kind of glad really. It started as a sequel to the first game and as of recently was going to be a spiritual successor to SS2 and I don't think related to the first game at all. They kind of imply they may do something with the property at some point so maybe this will turn out better than if this version of Prey 2 had been finished.

item.title: Prey 2 Officially Canceled
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
I still want a game based on Prey 2’s original pitch. Maybe one of these days they’ll pull a Warframe and make a new IP specifically for the idea that fell through. Hell, they don’t even have to completely disassociate it from Prey. They could call it “bounty” or something and allude to bits of Prey’s characters and events but never go full on.

Read full topic

item.title: Prey 2 Officially Canceled
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Prey was twice as long as it needed to be anyway, so it’s almost like we have it already.

Read full topic

item.title: Prey 2 Officially Canceled
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
Prey 2 canceled but Prey sequel is STILL being worked on by Arkane Austin.Hines is full of shit as usual…

item.title: Prey 2 Officially Canceled
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
This was going to be the new Duke Nukem Forever at this point. Probably for the best it was canned.
